thread.section_title: La Clef Tour Eiffel Paris - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Well balanced appartment hotel
thread.title_full: Well balanced appartment hotel - Review of La Clef Tour Eiffel Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: 162satoshim
title: Well balanced appartment hotel
text:
Felt comfortable staying this appartmnent hotel. 6 nights staying at 2 bedroom.
Safe, clean and silent in the room and friendly service at reception with good advice.
Very convenient location walking distance to Effel Tower and Arc de Triomphe and excellent restaurants and patisseries in 16e.
Good atomoshere as there was no group travel tourist
Well balanced price against width of room and conditions.
